name: HeliFly:Alpha Shoot
description:
HeliFly is a 2D Combat Shooter game where player have chance to meet some "paragliders" and aeroplanes to dodge them and made there own highscores. Player is a helicopter which is controlled by two joysticks , one for movement and other for shooting.

Do check out my youtube channel "Meenanitia" for more interesting content. Your day may go best! 

Note: Thanks Itch.io for there assets , some extra assets credit goes to Mini Militia Classic (appsomniacs) and Air Attack (ads) owners.
